snippet: The Islanders gave up a game-tying goal with 49 seconds left against the Capitals and then saw Alexander Ovechkin get the winner in overtime.
abstract: NHL Roundup; Washington Capitals defeat New York Islanders, 3-2; other scores noted.
lead_paragraph: The Islanders gave up a game-tying goal with 49 seconds left against the Capitals and then saw Alexander Ovechkin get the winner in overtime.

headline.main: On Verge of Ending Slump, the Islanders Let a Victory Slip Away Again
headline.print_headline: On Verge of Ending Slump, the Islanders Let a Victory Slip Away Again
